channel.title: recsys on Vivien BOGNE
channel.description: Recent content in recsys on Vivien BOGNE

item.title: Project IV: Create a recommender system for Movies and Benchmark it
item.description: Read the MovieLens dataset. Create 2 model pipelines : 1st pipeline : Load data, Train test split, model training, prediction, evaluation. 2nd pipeline : Load data, cross validation. Benchmark the User based and item based collaborative filtering models using the cosine and pearson correlation similarity metrics. The complete notebook : https://github.com/vivien-DSA/recsys_practice
